extracted_text:
According to web searches, JSW Steel announced the incorporation of a joint venture company on August 28, 2025, to develop an iron ore project in Andhra Pradesh . This was considered a top corporate update by some financial news sources on that day.

Joint venture incorporation: JSW Steel completed the incorporation of APJSW Private Limited, a joint venture with the Andhra Pradesh Mineral Development Corporation (APMDC).

Purpose of the joint venture: The new entity will develop the Konijedu Marlapadu Integrated Iron Ore Project, with the goal of producing 1.3 million tons of beneficiated iron ore concentrate annually.

Strategic importance: This project is intended to enhance the company's raw material security, replace imported iron ore, and reduce costs.

Ownership structure: JSW Steel holds an 89% stake in the joint venture, with APMDC holding the remaining 11%.
